title: Hand drawn?
content:
Hey All,

Looking to ID these two initials. The C was placed ontop of the V originally and the blemishes in the curves are from a bad photoshop job seperating them.

These may very well be hand drawn… any ideas? Thanks -

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [CV.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060520054204/http:/typophile.com/files/CV.jpg) | 18.14 KB |
author: SF Highlander

comments.content: The tail on the C is definitely a hand-drawn add-on to [Charlemagne](http://web.archive.org/web/20060520054204/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/charlemagne/regular/).

Hey - Thanks for the assist…

Just out of curiosity, why do you say its “definitley” Charlemagne… Seems hard to tell from just a single character.

Really - Thanks a lot, appreciate the help.
